statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id = 100 AND duration_seconds > 60;
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE page_url = '/home' AND visit_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE duration_seconds > 60 AND visitor_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE page_view_count > 100 AND time_spent_on_page < 30;
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 100 AND page_view_count > 10;
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE visit_date < '2022-01-01' AND visit_count < 5;
DELETE FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 10 AND action_type = 'click';
